meaningMnemonic: The <radical>mouth</radical> of the <radical>king</radical> extends all the way around him (like in this kanji). Where his mouth reaches, that is his <kanji>country</kanji>, give or take a few <radical>drop</radical>s.
readingMnemonic: Turns out the king of this <kanji>country</kanji> loves drinking <reading>Coke</reading> (こく). Every morning that big mouth of his swallows a whole 2-liter bottle of Coke for breakfast.
